Accompagnement

Nous vous accompagnons de bout en bout dans la création et la croissance de votre e‑commerce : site Shopify soigné, visuels produits qui attirent l’attention et campagnes publicitaires tournées vers la conversion. Notre objectif : des résultats concrets et durables.

Résultats

Votre marque e‑commerce passe un cap : conversion qui grimpe, panier moyen qui progresse, ROAS maîtrisé, acquisition plus rentable et rétention renforcée. Testez vite, apprenez, et scalez sereinement — une identité de marque cohérente et des performances qui parlent d’elles‑mêmes.

FAQs
FrequentlyAsked Questions
Emailcontact@ecomdomination.com
Commencez votre consultation
How many design requests can I submit?

You can submit as many requests as you’d like. They’ll be handled one at a time, in the order they’re added to your Notion board.

What kind of design work is included?

Design work typically includes UI/UX, web and app screens, branding assets, and marketing collateral depending on the plan.

How fast will I receive my designs?

Most requests are turned around within 24–48 hours. Complex tasks may take longer.

Can I pause my subscription?

Yes, you can pause your subscription at any time and resume when you need more design work.

What if I need development too?

We collaborate with development partners or can integrate with your dev team to ship high-quality products.
